# -*- ck2.events -*-

################################################################################
# WARNING: Do NOT modify this file manually!

# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.

# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################

########################################
##	  RELIGION EVENTS (CODEGEN)	  ##
########################################

# These events are meant to create and maintain dummy characters, each of whose sole utility
# is to have a specific religion as their public religion.
# They are used because some religion-based triggers (e.g. is_heretic, is_heresy_of,
# is_parent_religion) do not work in religion scopes and only check for characters' public
# religion, not their true religion. This means that in order to check whether a character's
# true religion complies with one of these triggers, the game needs to run the trigger on the
# dummy character whose public religion matches the given character's true religion.

namespace = emf_religion_codegen

# emf_religion_codegen.0 -- initialize dummy religion characters
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.0

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes
	
	religion = hip_religion

		has_landed_title = e_hip

				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_sunni_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }

		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = zun_pagan_reformed
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = zun_pagan
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = hellenic_pagan
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = bon_reformed
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = bon
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_bon_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = zoroastrian
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = mazdaki
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_mazdaki_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = zurvanist
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court

				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_zurvanist_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = manichean
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_manichean_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = mandaean
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_mandaean_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = yazidi
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_yazidi_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = khurmazta
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_khurmazta_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = jewish
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_jewish_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = samaritan
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_samaritan_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = karaite
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_karaite_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = hindu
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_hindu_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = buddhist
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_buddhist_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = jain
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_jain_dummy
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_alive = yes } } }
			create_character = {
				dynasty = none
				religion = taoist
				trait = emf_isis_courtier
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				set_immune_to_pruning = yes
				diplomatic_immunity = yes
				emf_do_not_disturb = yes
				set_flag = no_court_invites # Instructs AI to never accept an invitation to another court
				set_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion # Instructs AI to never accept Demand Religious Conversion
				set_flag = emf_ai_never_convert_culture
				set_flag = emf_isis_courtier
				set_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character
				save_global_event_target_as = emf_global_taoist_dummy
			}
		}
	}
}

# emf_religion_codegen.1 -- handle the death of a religion dummy character [on_death]
character_event = {
	id = emf_religion_codegen.1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hide_window = yes

	has_character_flag = emf_religion_dummy_character

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			character = event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy
			character = event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_catholic_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_cathar_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_fraticelli_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_waldensian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_lollard_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_adoptionist_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_arian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_orthodox_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bogomilist_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_monothelite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_iconoclast_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_syriac_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_maronite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_miaphysite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_monophysite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_apostolic_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_paulician_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tondrakian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_nestorian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_messalian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_sunni_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zikri_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_ibadi_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_kharijite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_haruri_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_shiite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_waqifi_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zaydi_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hurufi_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_ismaili_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_druze_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_qarmatian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_aztec_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_bon_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mazdaki_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_zurvanist_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_manichean_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_mandaean_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_yazidi_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_khurmazta_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_jewish_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_samaritan_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_karaite_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_hindu_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_buddhist_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_jain_dummy
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { character = event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy }
			clear_global_event_target = emf_global_taoist_dummy
		}

		event_target:isis = { character_event = { id = emf_religion_codegen.0 } }
	}
}
